name: More Fish
description:
In a world of love and happiness. Sometimes their is even hopelessness. This game reminds us all that, though there is many many people out there, there is always another still looking for us.

Find your true love amongst the many in the sea. bring them home before that gigantic ex comes and messes up you day.

Controls: left click to move. Bout it.

Goal: try and reach 10 hearts, view by hovering mouse over you home.

Made within 48 hours for #lovejam. though spent at most 8 hours to make.

https://itch.io/jam/love-jam

thank you SimoensS, Mientje, KennyGuillaume for this inspiration.

made using GameMaker.

Update 2/11/2017:

+added an option for easy or hard modes.

Diffrent amount of fish spawn for each mode. Fixed infinite fish spawn bug. Fixed shark not despawning. Fixed graphical error of music button. changed the goal fish to follow player in easy or old method of same direction as player for hard. Few other optimizations.
